name: Oskar Bruening
overview:
As a native German, Oskar is all about precision engineering. He experienced his first thrills of code magically compiling at the age of 14 and has been hooked on technology ever since. Armed with a B.Sc. and a M.Eng. from MIT and Bay Area software experience from VMware, Vontu, and Symantec, he is now excited to have joined the ccLoop team as a director of engineering and founding employee.
When not plugged into the digital collective, Oskar can be found either traveling, roaming California's back-country roads on his motorcycle, or nurturing his artistic needs in his darkroom, engulfed in red light and chemical fumes.
